H0.text: third president of the united states of america. James Madison

H1.text: third president of the united states of america. James Monroe

H2.text: third president of the united states of america. John Adams

H3.text: third president of the united states of america. Thomas Jefferson

A4.text: Thomas Jefferson was the third president of the United States from 1801 to 1809.

A5.text: Jefferson was the nation's first U.S. secretary of state under George Washington and then the nation's second vice president under John Adams.
